XIII.i.6.2.h
.
Retroactive Lump-Sum Payment Eligibility for a Surviving Spouse
PL 116-315
authorized a retroactive lump-sum payment of MOHP for a surviving spouse back to the
date of heroism
or January 5, 2021, whichever is later.
Note
:  A lump-sum amount for MOHP for a surviving spouse is payable with an award entitlement date of no earlier than January 5, 2021.
Reference
:  For more information on retroactive lump-sum payments, see
38 CFR 3.802(d)
.
